title: Ep. 1014 - Never Go Full Beto-Male
description:
Beto O’Rourke turns a somber news conference in a grieving community into a petty campaign stunt, Obama and Biden exploit the shooting to bring attention to George Floyd, and the U.N. decries monkeypox coverage as “homophobic” and “racist.”

To view a full list of job openings at The Daily Wire and to apply, visit: https://utm.io/ueB9x .

Join Michael and the Daily Wire for Backstage Live At The Ryman on June 29th. Get your tickets now: https://utm.io/uezFr

NBA star Jonathan Isaac has withstood immense pressure to conform to popular social issues. He wrote a book about his experience and it is available now: https://utm.io/ud96e

—
